name: .OBL File Extension
summary: Learn about .OBL files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: OBL files are not meant to be opened by a user. Instead, openCanvas references OBL files. To install a brush in openCanvas, place the OBL file in the "preset" folder in the openCanvas installation directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
